common.error-decrypt: There was an error decrypting your wallet
common.error-wallet: There was an error creating your wallet, please try again.
common.error-password: Password doesn't match, please try again.
common.non-backup-subtitle: Before retrieving your wallet address, we recommended that you first write down your paper key and store it securely so that your wallet can be recovered in the case your device was lost or stolen.

home.no-wallets-title: You  have created no wallets yet.
home.no-wallets-subtitle-1: To start, please create a wallet by tapping over the
home.no-wallets-subtitle-2: button in the bottom right, select either the scan or create wallet option and follow the shown steps.

intro.title: ConcretePay
intro.description-1: Store your coins on the safest lightweight wallet
intro.description-2: You can import your wallet using a mnemonic or create a new one!
intro.description-3: Wallets are created using the top standards, so they are compatible with other crypto tools.
intro.description-4: Wallets are secured on your own device, which means no one can access it.
intro.tos: I understand that my funds are held securely on the device and the company doesn't have access to my funds.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Preferences
settings.warning-resync-coins: Do you want to resync the coin information?
settings.warning-resync-rates: Do you want to resync the rates information?

add.title: Create Wallet
add.create-password: Please set up a password to your wallet.
add.create-password-confirm: Confirm your password to generate your wallet.

delete.title: Delete Wallet
delete.warning: Warning, removing your wallet without having the backup seed can result on funds lost

name.title: Wallet Name
name.subtitle: What do you call this wallet?
name.name: Name

stake.title: Cold Staking
stake.description-1: Cold Staking is an advanced function to help the consensus system delegating your coins.
stake.description-2: This method is secure since you only delegate your stake power and not your coins
stake.error: There was an error submitting your stake transaction

backup.title: Backup Wallet
backup.info-text-2: Now is a perfect time to assess your surroundings. Nearby windows? Hidden cameras? Shoulder-spies?
backup.info-text-3: Anyone with your backup phrase can access or spend your coins.
backup.instructions-1: Please write this words somewhere safe.
backup.backup-instructions: Click on the words to add them on the correct order
backup.error-backup: Your mnemonic doesn't match. Please try again and make sure you are importing on the correct order.

confirm.title: Confirm Payment
confirm.confirm-send: Are you sure you want to send
confirm.error-balance: You don't have enough balance to perform the transaction

import.title: Import Wallet
import.invalid-mnemonic: The mnemonic phrase is not valid, please try again.
import.instructions-1: Click on the buttons to add the
import.warning-1: Using your mnemonic with clipboard (copy/paste) or plain text could leak your coins. Please use it only if you know what you are doing.

wallet.info-backup: Your mnemonic is backed up. You are able to recover your wallet.
wallet.info-non-backup: Your mnemonic is not backed up. You will not be able to recover your wallet.
wallet.hide-wallet: Are you sure you want to hide this coin?
